description: This file declares the API interface for a sort list object, including functions for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization. It serves as the exported header for the 'Ansc Sort List' component, defining symbols and function prototypes used externally.

methods.name: AnscCreateSortList
methods.description: Creates and returns a new sort list object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: AnscSloCreate
methods.description: Constructs a new sort list object with specified context and owner handles.

methods.name: AnscSloRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified sort list object.

methods.name: AnscSloEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers internal objects within the sort list instance.

methods.name: AnscSloInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the sort list object, preparing it for use.
